name: Hardest Big Fat Liar Trivia Quiz | B | 10 Questions

questions.text: What child actor played the role of Jason Shephard?
questions.explanation:
Frankie Muniz & Muniz.

	Frankie Muniz is better known for playing Malcolm on "Malcolm in the Middle".

questions.text: When Jason has to come up with a story as to why he didn't write his paper, he concocted that his father had to go to the emergency room. What did he say his father choked on?
questions.explanation:
Meatball.

	This movie was directed by Shawn Levy, who prior to this has done a lot of work for "Nickelodeon" such as "Animorphs" and "The Famous Jett Jackson".

questions.text: In which state did Jason Shepherd live in?
questions.explanation:
Michigan.

	When he is riding his sister's bicycle, it has a Michigan license plate.  The state was also mentioned during the movie.

questions.text: What was the name of the character played by Amada Bynes?
questions.explanation:
Kaylee.

	Amanda Bynes is known for the TV shows "All That", "Figure It Out" and has a new show for the 2002 season entitled "What I Like About You" where she co-stars with Jennie Garth.

questions.text: Paul Giamatti played the producer steals Jason Shepherd's story. What was his character's last name?
questions.explanation:
Wolf.

	Other movies that Paul Giamatti has appeared in include "Planet of the Apes", "Man on the Moon", "Duets", and "Saving Private Ryan".

questions.text: What was the name of the producer's stuffed monkey?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Funnybones

	An error to look for when viewing this movie is when Jason finishes his paper "Big Fat Liar" he staples it but when Marty Wolf picks it up in the limo, it is not stapled.

Lee Majors.

	Lee Majors is known for playing a stuntman on TV in the series "The Fall Guy" and also starred in "The Six Million Dollar Man".

questions.text: Jaleel White starred as himself, playing a police officer whose partner was a chicken. What was the name of the chicken?
questions.explanation:
Whitaker.

	Jaleel White is better known for playing Steve Urkel on "Family Matters". Throughout the movie, Jaleel tries to convince Marty Wolf that he is not Urkel.  The title of the movie they are making is "Whitaker and Fowl" with Jaleel White playing Fowl.

questions.text: What number blue dye did Jason pour into the swimming pool?
questions.explanation:
30.

	You can read the number on the bottle when he's pouring the dye into the pool.

questions.text: The movie was based on a story by Dan Schneider and Brian Robbins. What TV show did these two co-star together in?
questions.explanation:
Head of the Class.

	"Head of the Class" ran from 1986-1991 and starred Howard Hesseman. Dan Schneider played Dennis Blunden and Brian Robbins played Eric Mardian on "Head of the Class". Dan Schneider also has writing credit for "Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius" and "Good Burger".  Brian Robbins also has directed "Varsity Blues" and "Hardball".
